title: The one buff Karthus NEEDS
body:
Make his requiem quotes global.
Seriously, it's a 170 cd ult, give it some more "UMF".

Double standards really. I'm casually farming Top with the Huekaiser and suddenly I hear "THEY SHALL NOT HAVE YOU!"
Think I give a bloody damn what the enemy kalista has to say? Nope, it doesn't impact me in any way so why doesn't Karthus, whose ult affects EVERY enemy, get global quotes?

It would be hella cool and don't tell me it's annoying or unneccessary, heck if Kalista gets it so why doesn't the Deathsinger?

~M.M

replies.body:
# _"I AM THE LIGHTBRINGER!"_

Hearing that globally would make dying to Requiem actually worth the death timer.

This might be going too far but we should hear the "Lighthbringer" instrumentals if karthus manages to kill us with his ult.
I would say deathfiregrasp but that thing is out of the game xD.

Why would it be going too far?

That's actually one of his quotes while using ultimate (on a pentakill skin). [There ya go.](http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/c/c5/PentakillKarthus.R1.ogg/revision/latest?cb=20140522070851&filename=PentakillKarthus.R1.ogg)

I know that his pentakill skin has some extra quotes but you know, they probably would want that as a feature of a skin rather than give i to all the normal karthuses :P

It's a pretty dope skin though.

And if that "clutters the audio too much" or whatever the hell Riot's excuse for it was, just make him laugh globally while he channels

Like that's not really that hard, right? Kalista's VO is global when she ults and it's not even a big map-wide spell. I'm so confused by the decision to make it global ._.
What confuses me more is that her VO when she chooses a partner is also global. Like, they took out Robot Amumu's global laugh but Kalista can taunt the whole team with her soulbond? Wtf?
It is both the buff we need and the buff we deserve.

Every. Freaking. Time!
Global quotes for global ultimates!

{{champion:16}} "LIVE!"
Can we get one for Soraka on R as well?
Doesn't she already shout "LIVE!" globally?
Nope. Across the map, you just hear faint sparkles.

There was a discussion about this previously. The reason Riot is hesitant to give Karthus a global taunt when he ults is because the channel time is so long. 3 seconds is already quite distracting for visuals, but a taunt or scream would make it worse.

That's their opinion not mine, don't shoot the messenger.

I never understood this reason.  You could simply have the global taunt be shorter than the channel, and add it on at the start or the end of the channel.  But I doubt the person who'd make the decision would ever read this :p

I remember way back before anyone had global quotes riot said something about "we dont want to clutter noise space." 

Then they made new Sion saying "you should be aware when Sion could be charging at you from fog of war"

Then they made Kalista...I don't even think they gave a reason for her global passive quotes. 

Now we have Kindred coming out with a few more global quotes relating to her hunt passive.

They've said that some of his voice lines are a fair bit longer than the actual ult and it varies from language to language, so it's basically impossible to time it properly and not have Karthus continue talking awkwardly for 5-10 seconds after the ult ended.
Yet they don't consider Karthus talking to himself for said 8-10 seconds is awkward...

I still want a 0.001 chance though to hear {{champion:51}} say: **"I'M TRYING TO NO SCOPE. GET NO SCOPED!"** though.
I'd love for {{champion:16}} to have a global quote, but it wouldn't work for the others. Their ults are skill shots,and the global quote would give enemies an advantage in dodging them.
